snippet: A Russian diplomat said a measure forcing all sides in the Syrian civil war to allow access to humanitarian groups would have no practical impact.
abstract: United Nations Security Council draft resolution that would force all parties in the bloody Syrian conflict to allow access for humanitarian organizations falls apart when representatives from Russia and China fail to show up.
lead_paragraph: A Russian diplomat said a measure forcing all sides in the Syrian civil war to allow access to humanitarian groups would have no practical impact.

headline.main: Russia and China Skip Security Council Meeting on Humanitarian Aid to Syria
headline.print_headline: Russia and China Skip Security Council Meeting on Humanitarian Aid to Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
